desc: Organic Candy Factory is a trusted name offering high quality organic vegan kosher candy without all of the bad "stuff". Dairy Free, Allergen Free, No Added Sugar, No Corn Syrup, Non GMO, Organic, Vegan, Kosher. If youre going to eat candy, eat our candy!

layout.text: The First Organic Vegan Kosher Gummy Bear in the World!
